input_data.title: Two Weeks to Live
input_data.overview: When strange young misfit Kim Noakes was just a little girl, her father died in murky circumstances and her mother Tina whisked her away to a remote rural life of seclusion and bizarre survival techniques. Now all grown up, Kim sets out into the real world for the first time to begin a secret mission of honouring her father’s memory.

response.analytical_summary: Two Weeks to Live is a darkly comedic action-adventure series centered on a young woman, Kim Noakes, who has spent her life isolated in the wilderness and is now thrust into the complexities of the modern world. The series blends elements of survivalism, crime, and humor as Kim attempts to honor her deceased father's memory while navigating unfamiliar social structures and confronting dangerous individuals. It explores themes of family, identity, and the clash between a self-reliant upbringing and the realities of contemporary society, offering a unique and often absurd narrative experience.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with Kim Noakes, raised in near-total isolation by her mother, Tina, after the mysterious death of her father. Tina has instilled in Kim extreme survival skills and a deep distrust of the outside world. Upon reaching adulthood, Kim embarks on a mission to uncover the truth behind her father’s death, believing it was no accident. Her journey leads her into the criminal underworld of Newcastle, where she encounters a group of inept criminals led by Jay, a man whose life is spiraling out of control. Kim’s unique skillset and unconventional methods quickly disrupt their operations, leading to a chaotic and often hilarious series of events. As she delves deeper into her father’s past, she uncovers a web of secrets and betrayals, forcing her to confront not only dangerous adversaries but also the painful truths about her family. The series culminates in a confrontation with those responsible for her father’s death, revealing a complex conspiracy that extends far beyond what Kim initially suspected, ultimately forcing her to choose between her desire for revenge and a chance at a new life.
response.keyword_sentence: Two Weeks to Live is a darkly comic action-adventure series set in modern-day Newcastle, following a young woman raised in isolation who seeks revenge for her father’s death while navigating a world of crime and eccentric characters.
